review: All the promo copy says it will display on your TV whatever is on your Mac, iPad or iPhone. Not true. It won't show DVD's, which was my main purpose in getting it. Eveything works fine until I put a DVD in my Mac, then all I got was a checkerboard graphic. I own the DVD but Apple TV won't transmit it from my Mac to my TV. I assume if I bought the movie through iTunes it would work. I did not try to watch an Amazon.prime streaming movie so can't comment on if that would work.
author: Auggie

review: The Apple TV was great for a christmas present t o my mom and dad. It came quickly and was packaged really well. The shipping box had a large bubble wrap to ensure that it didn't rattle one bit. The apple packaging was pristine as well. It works great and is extremely easy to set up and use. Be sure that you buy an HDMI cable, as it does not come with one. However, the Apple HDMI cable is fairly inexpensive and widely available. If you're looking for one of the best TV, photo, video, music streaming and computer home sharing devices, I strongly recommend this product.
